text: Braine-le-Comte is a municipality in the Belgian province of Hainaut. Maxime Daye is a mayor. == Overview == In 2018, 21,649 people lived there. It is at 50° 36 North, 04° 08 East. The municipality has an area of 84.68 square kilometres. There are 5 sub-municipalities of Braine-le-Comte: Hennuyères, Henripont, Petit-Rœulx-lez-Braine, Ronquières, and Steenkerque (Steenkerke). In 1830, the post-office was opened there. == References == == Other websites == * Website Category:Municipalities of Hainaut
title: Braine-le-Comte
